emr_vis_nlp.model

Interface MainModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MpqaColonMainModel, NullMainModel

    public interface MainModel
    Interface which should be implemented by all classes seeking to act as the model in the MVC design pattern for the emr-vis-nlp system. Specifically, MainModels are responsible for loading the back-end raw data, along with its manual annotations and attribute list (if any), which will be manipulated through the interface. MainModels are also responsible for keeping track of which documents and attributes within the dataset are currently enabled. Note: Neither MainModel nor any of the contents of the emr_vis_nlp.model package is responsible for back-end NLP predictions. All NLP and ML components should be stored in the emr_vis_nlp.ml package.
    See Also:
    TODO: interface could be consolidated, refactored to have less risk of exposure of backing datastructures, ie, ensure that access to the document list is controlled, etc.

      • getAllDocuments

        java.util.List<Document> getAllDocuments()
        Returns:
        List containing all Documents from this data source

      • getIsDocumentEnabledList

        java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> getIsDocumentEnabledList()
        Returns:
        List of boolean indicators as to which documents (as returned by getAllDocuments()) are currently enabled.

      • getAllAttributes

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllAttributes()
        Returns:
        List of names for all attributes in model

      • getIsAttributeEnabledList

        java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> getIsAttributeEnabledList()
        Returns:
        List of flags as to which attributes in model are currently "enabled" (disabled attributes should not be displayed in the visualization)

      • updateDocumentAttr

        boolean updateDocumentAttr(int globalDocID,
                         java.lang.String docAttr,
                         java.lang.String docAttrVal)
        Updates target document's target attribute with the designated value.
        Parameters:
        globalDocID - global integer identifier for document (index into getAllDocuments())
        docAttr - name of an attribute used in this model
        docAttrVal - the manually-annotated value which this should have for this document
        Returns:
        true if update was completed successfully, false otherwise

      • hasManAnn

        boolean hasManAnn(int globalDocId,
                java.lang.String attrName)
        Returns whether a manual annotation exists in the given document for the given attribute.
        Parameters:
        globalDocId - global integer identifier for document (index into getAllDocuments())
        attrName - name of an attribute used in this model
        Returns:

      • getManAnn

        java.lang.String getManAnn(int globalDocId,
                         java.lang.String attrName)
        Provides the manual annotation for the given document for the given attribute.
        Parameters:
        globalDocId - global integer identifier for document (index into getAllDocuments())
        attrName - name of an attribute used in this model
        Returns:
        the value of the manual annotation in the document for the given attribute if it exists, null otherwise
